sentence.Network_en: The sunshine comes and goes , outpouring driblet and melodious love songs.
sentence.Network_cn: 光线在转化中流露出点点滴滴曼妙地情歌.

sentence.Network_en: Years afterward they would pay the blood - money driblet by driblet.
sentence.Network_cn: 将来他们会一点一点付出血腥钱的.

sentence.Network_en: He felt a driblet of fear.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'small sum of money'): from obsolete drib (see dribble) + -let

means.word_mean: 1. a small quantity (especially of a liquid);

sentences.sentence: "one drop of each sample was analyzed"
"any child with a drop of negro blood was legally a negro"
"there is not a drop of pity in that man"
